description.value:
If a creature dies after being reduced to 0 HP by Drink Blood, a vrykolakas master can turn this creature into a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-2.Actor.Vrykolakas Spawn] by donating some of its own blood to the creature and burying it in earth for 3 nights.

Such vrykolakas spawn are generally friendly to the vrykolakas that created them, but they are not under its control and typically wander off on their own rampage within [[/r 1d6 #days]]{1d6 days} of their creation.
